description: This file defines the main layout component for a React application, including navigation, sidebar, header, and internationalized components used for routing and UI layout.

classes.name: GlobalDateSelector
classes.description: A React component for selecting a date range, dispatching the selection to the Redux store.

classes.name: RootLayout
classes.description: Main layout component for the application, managing structure, navigation, and layout elements.

methods.description: Component that provides a date range picker connected to Redux.

methods.name: RootLayout
